product_name: The North Face Warm Long Underwear Tights - Women's
long_description: The women's The North Face Warm long underwear tights help keep you comfortable and ready to explore in cold weather. Midweight moisture-wicking polyester and polyolefin fabric features FlashDry(TM) microparticles embedded in the fabric to dramatically improve dry time and breathability. Made of crushed coconut shells and crushed volcanic rock, the FlashDry fabric additive leads to faster dry times and will not wash out. You'll move without restriction thanks to the stretchy fabric and flat seams which are designed to enhance motion. The women's North Face Warm long underwear tights offer a relaxed next-to-skin fit that skims the body.
short_description: The women's The North Face Warm long underwear tights help keep you comfortable and ready to explore in cold weather.
